member.name: R:PhotoAtomic.SyncWcf
member.summary: SyncWcf allows to use in a Silverlight project the same synchronous service interface used at server side without rewriting it using the BeginOperation-EndOperation pattern

member.name: N:PhotoAtomic.SyncWcf
member.summary: Contains the classes required t ooperate on asynchronous Wcf channel from Silverlight in a synchronous-like way
